title: 5 Signs Your E-commerce Integration Is Failing (And How to Fix It)
subtitle: How to Spot Integration Problems Before They Cost You Sales and Customer Trust
description: Learn to identify the 5 warning signs that your e-commerce integration is failing. Quick diagnostic checklist for inventory sync issues, order delays, and data discrepancies—plus when to fix vs outsource.
author: James Plant

metadata.title: 5 Signs Your E-commerce Integration Is Failing (And How to Fix It) | The Bearded Developer
